summary: Rebalancing the vanilla tanning system so that hides and pelts give reasonable amounts of leather.
descriptionHtml:
= What does it do? =
This small mod chiefly alters the amounts of leather you will get from hides and pelts.

As a small side bonus, leather was reduced down to a weight of 1.0 (Mostly to make the math easier so I wouldn\'t have to alter all the hide and pelt weights too).

The Leather Strips recipe was also altered as the idea of getting four 0.1 weight strips out of a piece of leather that would weigh 2.0 (or 1.0 units with this mod) was simply outrageous to me.

= Why? =
Because I spent the best part of 20 levels running round with one goat hide in my inventory when you need two to make leather, yet I only need one fox hide to make leather.

= Installation Instructions =
Just drop \"Tanning_Changes.esp\" into your \"Skyrim/Data\" folder and enable it.

= Requirements =
None

= Alterations Made =
Leather - Weight changed from 2.0 to 1.0
Leather Strips recipe - Was 1:4, now 1:10

The following leather recipes have had their production ratios altered.
*	Fox Hide - was 1:1, now 2:1
*	Snow Fox Hide - was 1:1, now 2:1
*	Goat Hide - was 2:1, now, 1:1
*	Wolf Hide - Unchanged
*	Ice Wolf Hide - Unchanged
*	Deer Hide (Deer) - Unchanged
*	Deer Hide (Elk) - Unchanged
*	Cow Hide - was 1:3, now 1:2
*	Horse Hide - was 1:3, now 1:2
*	Sabre Cat Pelt - was 1:4, now 1:2
*	Sabre Cat Snow Pelt - was 1:4, now 1:2
*	Bear Pelt - was 1:4, now 1:3

= Version =
03-Oct-2012: 1.0 - Release
author: Iamiko
